item.title: Simple stock prediction with ANN
item.description: THIS IS AN ONGOING PROJECT The task of predicting stock market prices is challenging. Thatâ€™s what drove me to do this project. Due to high volatility, investors use a combination of technical and fundamental analysis to help them better decisions about their equity market decisions. A newly popular technical methods is using artificial neural networks (ANN). Therefore, this project aims to find out which ANN model has the best performance.
